title: WhatsApp and gtask and more apps keep crushing when I'm typing a long message /text, pixel 4a
content:
During the type, after a while it crushes. Not only one app. 

Tried to restart, didn't work. 

Will be happy to know if you've experienced it also, or I'm the only one that reached that length threshold ðŸ˜…
